text: Angelo Genocchi (5 March 1817 – 7 March 1889) was an Italian mathematician who specialized in number theory. He worked with Giuseppe Peano. The Genocchi numbers are named after him. Genocchi was President of the Academy of Sciences of Turin. ==Notes== ==References== * Obituary in: * Category:19th-century Italian mathematicians Category:1817 births Category:1889 deaths
title: Angelo Genocchi
